channel.title: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash
channel.description:
### Issue Summary As of today, when signing in via Google to our self-hosted setup, it is throwing the following error ![Redash Login Error|447x345](upload://iQtBP8qRHS1vdNi2fw4eZmLnAGZ.png)
Is anyone else facing the same or knows how to fix this?
### Technical details:
* Redash Version:8.0.0+b32245 * Browser/OS: Chrome

item.title: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash

item.description:
Trying to get them Jesse

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Sorry to be a pest here. But we really can’t help on this at all unless someone provides actual logs of the problem. “It doesn’t work” isn’t detailed enough for us to investigate.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash

item.title: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash
item.dc:creator: itay_a
item.description:
Also happened to my user,
it happened after my computer was restarted,
and now i can’t login using the Google authentication,
is there a fix for that?

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash

item.title: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
We won’t push updates for V8 any more. But if you can provide any sort of debugging information from Google we can check to see if V10 (or V11) will work.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to use Google log in on self hosted Redash

Haven’t upgraded because we are unsure what else will break.
